Package univers.personnages

Class PersonnageCombattant

java.lang.Object
univers.personnages.Personnage
univers.personnages.PersonnageCombattant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersoGroupe, PersonnageAdversaire, PersonnageCombatantTest
public abstract class PersonnageCombattant extends Personnage
an abstract class to represent all of our fighting characters (allies or ennemies)
See Also:
